text: A computer-generated randomization list was used to assign newborns to one of the six groups. This information was available only to the principal investigator. Infants were assigned a sequential, number that was placed in an opaque, sealed envelope by the nurse who received the signed parental informed consent. When the newborn was scheduled to undergo the metabolic screening test, the envelope was opened by the nurse who performed the test.
sentences: A computer-generated randomization list was used to assign newborns to one of the six groups.
This information was available only to the principal investigator.
Infants were assigned a sequential, number that was placed in an opaque, sealed envelope by the nurse who received the signed parental informed consent.
When the newborn was scheduled to undergo the metabolic screening test, the envelope was opened by the nurse who performed the test.
